title: Bug 117981 - Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not register.
EB: The expected behavior is that any item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Attempt to select any item for the first time. The selection does not work. 3. Subsequently attempt to select the same item again. It can be selected on the second attempt.
